title: Your Laugh Is As Important As You Are
content:
Your smile and teeth are the first thing people notice when you say hello. Finding a dentist who offers a full spectrum of services can keep your mouth health and smile healthy. Going from dentist office to dentist office because a dentist only offers basic dental services, is burdensome and [dentist salary](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326161329/http:/www.reddit.com/r/business/comments/249nrl/glendale_dental_office/?already_submitted=true) time consuming.

Infinite Dental Wellness offers:

Regular Cleaning and Checkups

Fillings and Root Canals

Cosmetic Treatments

Laser Gum Treatment

Oral Surgery

Preventative Care

Pediatric Dentistry

Dental Stem Cell Banking

What this means to you is your child can start at a dentist office and receive all of their care including braces and into their adult and elderly years. If your child should break a tooth by a fall, sports injury or car accident, they can go to their own dentist for treatment. There is no need to wait for a referral to a specialist for care.

The dental stem cell banking program that is offered is an opportunity to help ensure your child's future health and yours. When your child loses its teeth, most people don't save them. Your teeth and your child's teeth have stem cells within them. These stem cells have been show to help heal the body in the future if they should come diseased. If you or your child has a tooth pulled, considering banking it and the interest earned in the possibility of making your health better in the event you become ill.

Maybe your teeth are not as white you'd like them or as straight as you'd like them, there is a painless option to get the perfect smile. Snap-on Smile is an option for you if you don't want to braces. It literally snaps onto your existing teeth. It is completely painless and only takes two visits to complete. For more information about snap-on smiles, check infinitedentalwellness.

If you prefer to not have a smile that you can snap in or out of your mouth, you can also consider veneers to correct your smile. Veneers use to require a great deal of grinding on your existing teeth, but no longer. Veneers are now thinner and can be placed over your teeth for a permanent healthy-looking smile. Veneers are pain free and last for over 20 years.

No matter what your dental needs are having one place to go for all of your dental needs gives you familiarity with dentist, the office and saves you searching for specialists. If you're interested in having one-stop dental care, check into infinitedentalwellness.
